content:
Sure, here are some beginner yoga poses you can practice daily:

1. Mountain Pose (Tadasana)
2. Downward-Facing Dog (Adho Mukha Svanasana)
3. Warrior I (Virabhadrasana I)
4. Warrior II (Virabhadrasana II)
5. Triangle Pose (Trikonasana)
6. Child’s Pose (Balasana)
7. Bridge Pose (Setu Bandhasana)
8. Cobra Pose (Bhujangasana)
9. Seated Forward Bend (Paschimottanasana)
10. Easy Pose (Sukhasana)

Remember to practice each pose slowly and safely, focusing on your breath and alignment. Listen to your body and do not force any pose beyond what feels comfortable. If you have any injuries or medical conditions, consult with a healthcare professional before practicing yoga.
